author: Joseph Diaz
raw_text: Cover Art  Monk's Mirror    Joseph Diaz is a concept artist and illustrator with more than a decade of professional experience. He has done artwork for more than fifty movies and shows, such as Warcraft, Game of Thrones, A Monster Calls, and Lost in Space. He was nominated for the Art Director's Guild Award in 2012 for his work in the movie The Impossible. He also works as an illustrator for games like Star Trek Adventures and Deep Madness.

Cover Art
Monk's Mirror
Joseph Diaz is a concept artist and illustrator with more than a decade of professional experience. He has done artwork for more than fifty movies and shows, such as Warcraft, Game of Thrones, A Monster Calls, and Lost in Space. He was nominated for the Art Director's Guild Award in 2012 for his work in the movie The Impossible. He also works as an illustrator for games like Star Trek Adventures and Deep Madness.
